column5: EBIX Outperforming the broader market lately for a change and not trading like shorts are piling on and manipulating Good sign I think the specter of a the Yatra deal announcement is supporting share price At this point with market conditions so rough I will be happy keeping the specter of a potential Yatra deal out there without deal being made as long as possible so that we do not crash with the broader market
EBIX What happened to the volume This is anemic
